All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class DirectionPanel
extends javax.swing.AbstractButton

Realizes a (compass-like) round direction display with an arrow and the display of the direction in degrees.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Uli Walther
See Also:
Serialized Form
